import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update a blog comment"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/community/blog/comment/{commentid}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a blog comment specified in the request changing its content.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"commentid","in":"path","description":"Comment ID","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"content":{"description":"New comment text","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Updated blog comment","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
